rows.tasks: Interviews/workshops with stakeholders to understand current processes, software and resources.
rows.effort: PM plus a facilitator if required will spend up to 20 days finding out and mapping current efforts

rows.tasks: Agree who & which software will be involved in collection, aggregation and consumption.
rows.effort: PM will make recommendation to project board to make a decision

rows.tasks: Map out the process to be used for collecting data into a single repository
rows.effort: Service provider/collector will submit their data in 1 day.Collectors will continue to work in the scope

rows.tasks: Allocate service providers to a team of assurers, with guidance on how data can be trusted by consumers.
rows.effort: Assurer will work on initial data for 0.5 day per service provider and then 0.25 per regular assurance
